text: UPDATE : The Los Angeles Police Department tells Us Weekly that Tyga was not arrested. “ Today around 1 : 30 this morning in Hollywood division on Selma and Cherokee, Hollywood division officers conducted a traffic stop on a vehicle that had paper plates. Officers decided to conduct a field sobriety test. However, due to all the paparazzi at the location, officers decided to transfer Mr. Stevenson to Hollywood station, ” the LAPD said. “ He passed the field sobriety test and was released. He was cited for a minor traffic violation. ” Original story below Tyga was detained by Los Angeles Police Department officers after leaving Hollywood ’ s Avenue nightclub in the early hours of Wednesday, April 12.
